Uglyness, Improvements

Some changes in layout are, quite obviously, taking place. It’s hard to find a format for weblogs that’s readable, attractive, clean, and renderable in most modern browsers. Not so hard, however, that a few designs haven’t become quite popular. The look I’m using is adapted from a number of places, but Waferbaby is my biggest source of inspiration (cheers!). Bear with me through some glitches and shifting, and things should come up roses.

—Jan 22, 2003
